subject: Baseball
World Series
lead_paragraph: The Giants, behind a strong pitching performance by Madison Bumgarner and a lucky roll of a bunt in the seventh inning, beat the Tigers to take a 2-0 World Series lead.
snippet: The Giants, behind a strong pitching performance by Madison Bumgarner and a lucky roll of a bunt in the seventh inning, beat the Tigers to take a 2-0 World Series lead.
